languages.text: "Едва ли у него была возможность отличиться — Эвейн Винтерскейл, насколько нам известно, крайне редко покидал Райкад Минорис, проводя большую часть времени в шпилях. Плохая среда, чтобы снискать славу или хотя бы хлебнуть реальной жизни за пределами толстых стен". {n}Хейнрикс ловит взгляд Абеляра и пожимает плечом.{/n} "Мы должны быть информированы обо всех, кто хоть как-то связан с Вольными Торговцами Простора".

"I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Едва ли у него была возможность отличиться — Эвейн Винтерскейл, насколько нам известно, крайне редко покидал Райкад Минорис, проводя большую часть времени в шпилях. Плохая среда, чтобы снискать славу или хотя бы хлебнуть реальной жизни за пределами толстых стен". {n}Хейнрикс ловит взгляд Абеляра и пожимает плечом.{/n} "Мы должны быть информированы обо всех, кто хоть как-то связан с Вольными Торговцами Простора".

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment for gaining fame or at least getting to know the reality of life outside reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We have to stay informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

"I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment for gaining fame or at least getting to know the reality of life outside reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We have to stay informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

A poor environment for gaining fame or at least getting to know the reality of life outside reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We have to stay informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

A poor environment for gaining fame or at least getting to know the reality of life outside reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We have to stay informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

"I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

"I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

languages.text: "Ich bezweifle, dass er dazu viel Gelegenheit hatte. Soweit wir wissen, verlässt Evayne Winterzunder Rykad Minoris nur selten und verbringt die meiste Zeit in seinen Türmen. Keine gute Umgebung, um nach Ruhm zu streben oder vom echten Leben jenseits befestigter Wände zu kosten." {n}Heinrix bemerkt Abelards Blick und zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Wir müssen über alle Individuen informiert sein, die auch nur ansatzweise mit den Freihändlern der Ausdehnung zu tun haben."
languages.original_text: "I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bezweifle, dass er dazu viel Gelegenheit hatte. Soweit wir wissen, verlässt Evayne Winterzunder Rykad Minoris nur selten und verbringt die meiste Zeit in seinen Türmen. Eine schlechte Umgebung, um Ruhm zu erringen oder auch nur die Realität des Lebens außerhalb verstärkter Mauern kennenzulernen." {n}Heinrix bemerkt Abelards Blick und zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Wir müssen über alle Individuen informiert sein, die auch nur ansatzweise mit den Freihändlern der Ausdehnung zu tun haben."

languages.text: « Je doute fort qu'il en ait eu l'occasion. De ce que nous savons, Evayne Winterscale quitte rarement Rykad Minoris et passe la majeure partie de son temps dans ses tours. Ce n'est pas le genre d'environnement où on peut trouver la gloire, ni même s'exposer à la réalité de la vie hors des remparts de la cité. » {n}Heinrix croise le regard d'Abélard et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Nous devons nous tenir informés au sujet de toute personne ayant le moindre lien avec les libres-marchands des Étendues. »
languages.original_text: "I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute fort qu'il en ait eu l'occasion. De ce que nous savons, Evayne Winterscale quitte rarement Rykad Minoris et passe la majeure partie de son temps dans ses tours. Ce n'est pas le genre d'environnement où on peut trouver la gloire, ni même s'exposer à la réalité de la vie hors des remparts de la cité. » {n}Heinrix croise le regard d'Abélard et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Nous devons nous tenir informés au sujet de toute personne ayant le moindre lien avec les libres-marchands des Étendues. »

languages.text: “恐怕他恐怕没有多少声名鹊起的机会。据我们所知，艾维尼·温特斯凯尔极少离开小莱卡德，大部分时间都呆在尖塔之中。这样的环境不利于他闯出名声，甚至根本无法了解高墙之外真正的生活。”{n}海因里希注意到了阿贝拉德的目光，耸了耸肩。{/n}“出于责任，我们必须随时了解科罗努斯扩区所有与行商浪人有关的一切人物。”
languages.original_text: "I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕他恐怕没有多少声名鹊起的机会。据我们所知，艾维尼·温特斯凯尔极少离开小莱卡德，大部分时间都呆在尖塔之中。这样的环境不利于他闯出名声，也不利于他了解高墙之外真正的生活。”{n}海因里希注意到了阿贝拉德的目光，耸了耸肩。{/n}“我们必须随时了解科罗努斯扩区所有与行商浪人有关的一切人物。”

languages.text: 「彼に活躍する機会が多くあったとは思えないな。我々の知る限り、エヴァイン・ウィンタースケールはライカド・ミノリスを滅多に離れず、ほとんどの時間を尖塔で過ごしている。栄光を求めたり、強化された壁の向こうの現実の生活を味わったりするには、劣悪な環境だ」{n}ハインリックスはアベラルドの視線を受け止め、肩をすくめる。{/n}「エクスパンスの自由開拓者に少しでも関係ある人物について、我々は十分な情報を得る義務があるのでね」
languages.original_text: "I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「彼にそうする機会が多くあったとは思えないな。知ってる限りでは、エヴァインはライカド・ミノリスを出ることは滅多にないし、殆どの時間を尖塔の中で過ごしてる。名声を得たり壁の外の人生の現実を知るには、難しい環境だな」{n}ハインリックスはアベラルドの視線を受け止め、肩をすくめる。{/n}「エクスパンスの自由開拓者にちょっとでも関係ある人物のことは、よくわかってなきゃならんからな」

「彼に活躍する機会が多くあったとは思えないな。我々の知る限り、エヴァイン・ウィンタースケールはライカド・ミノリスを滅多に離れず、ほとんどの時間を尖塔で過ごしている。栄光を求めたり、強化された壁の向こうの現実の生活を味わったりするには、劣悪な環境だ」{n}ハインリックスはアベラルドの視線を受け止め、肩をすくめる。{/n}「エクスパンスの自由開拓者に少しでも関係ある人物について、我々は十分な情報を得る義務があるのでね」

languages.text: «Dudo que haya tenido ocasión para ello. Hasta donde sabemos, Evayne Winterscale no suele salir de Rykad Minoris y pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo en sus torres. Un ambiente muy poco propicio para buscar la gloria, o siquiera conocer cómo funciona el mundo más allá de sus reforzados muros». {n}Heinrix detecta la mirada de Abelard y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Es nuestro deber mantenernos informados sobre cualquier individuo que tenga la más remota conexión con los Comerciantes Independientes de la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que haya tenido ocasión para ello. Hasta donde sabemos, Evayne Winterscale no suele salir de Rykad Minoris y pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo en sus torres. Un ambiente muy poco propicio para adquirir fama o, al menos, para conocer cómo funciona el mundo más allá de sus reforzados muros». {n}Heinrix detecta la mirada de Abelard y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «Debemos obtener información sobre cualquier individuo que tenga la más remota conexión con los Comerciantes Independientes de la Extensión».

languages.text: "Henüz fırsatını bulamamış olabilir. Bildiğimiz kadarıyla Evayne Winterscale, nadiren Rykad Minoris'i terk eder ve vaktinin çoğunu kulelerinde geçirir. Hâliyle şan şöhret peşinde koşması ve takviyeli duvarların ötesindeki hayatın tadına varması pek mümkün olmuyordur." {n}Heinrix, Abelard'ın bakışlarını yakalayıp omuz silkiyor.{/n} Enginlik'teki Hür Tacirler ile uzaktan da olsa alakası bulunan herkesten haberdar olmak, görevimiz."
languages.original_text: "I doubt that he has had many opportunities to do so. As far as we know, Evayne Winterscale seldom leaves Rykad Minoris and spends most of his time in its spires. A poor environment in which to seek glory or even get a taste of real life beyond reinforced walls." {n}Heinrix catches Abelard's look and shrugs.{/n} "We are obliged to be well informed about any individual even remotely connected to the Rogue Traders of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Henüz fırsatını bulamamış olabilir. Bildiğimiz kadarıyla Evayne Winterscale, nadiren Rykad Minoris'i terk eder ve vaktinin çoğunu kulelerinde geçirir. Hâliyle şan şöhret peşinde koşması ve takviyeli duvarların ötesindeki hayatın tadına varması pek mümkün olmuyordur." {n}Heinrix, Abelard'ın bakışlarını yakalayıp omuz silkiyor.{/n} Enginlik'teki Hür Tacirler ile uzaktan da olsa alakası bulunan herkesten haberdar olmak, görevimiz."
